sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../../styles/elemon.css'; import { numberWithCommas } from '../NFTs/PriceTable'; const InfoCard = ({ elemon }) => { const rarity = ['B', 'A', 'S', 'SS', 'SSS']; const classes = [ 'Normal', 'Fire', 'Water', 'Electric', 'Grass', 'Ice', 'Fighting', 'Poison', 'Ground', 'Flying', 'Psychic', 'Bug', 'Rock', 'Ghost', 'Dragon', 'Dark', 'Steel', 'Fairy' ] const URI = 'https://app.elemon.io'; const bodyPart = [elemon.bodyPart1, elemon.bodyPart2, elemon.bodyPart3, elemon.bodyPart4, elemon.bodyPart5, elemon.bodyPart6]; return (

ID: {elemon.tokenId}

{elemon.lastPrice / 1000000000000000000} BUSD

{numberWithCommas(elemon.point)}

{elemon.ownerAddress ==='0x10201091597635eC7b8e208306E6aDCC7c167925'?'My Elemon':"Info"}
); }; export default InfoCard;
